statements: SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_notes FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 200 AND interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_notes FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 400 AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_notes FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND interaction_date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 500;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 AND interaction_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 5 AND interaction_type LIKE '%Call%';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2021-10-15' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 2;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(interaction_date, '2021-01-01')) AS avg_days_between_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_days_between_interactions < 30;
SELECT DISTINCT(interaction_type) AS unique_interaction_types FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT(interaction_type)) AS unique_interaction_types_count FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_interaction_types_count > 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, AVG(DATEDIFF(interaction_date, '2021-01-01')) AS avg_days_since_start FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date = (SELECT MAX(interaction_date) FROM interactions);
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = (SELECT interaction_type FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1);
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2);

SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31' UNION SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date = (SELECT MAX(interaction_date) FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 10);
SELECT interaction_notes, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_notes HAVING interaction_count > 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%Meeting%' AND interaction_date < '2021-10-15';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND interaction_date > '2021-09-01' AND interaction_notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM Calls;
SELECT call_id, customer_id FROM Calls WHERE duration_minutes > 10;
SELECT MIN(call_date) FROM Calls WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT call_id, call_date FROM Calls WHERE customer_id = 456 AND duration_minutes < 5;
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) FROM Calls;
SELECT MAX(duration_minutes) FROM Calls WHERE call_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Emails WHERE subject LIKE '%important%';
SELECT email_id, email_date FROM Emails WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Emails;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM Emails WHERE email_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MIN(email_date) FROM Emails;
SELECT * FROM Calls INNER JOIN Emails ON Calls.customer_id = Emails.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS email_count FROM Emails GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_duration, MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM Calls;
SELECT call_id, customer_id, DATEDIFF(NOW(), call_date) AS days_since_call FROM Calls;
SELECT email_id, body FROM Emails WHERE email_date = CURDATE();
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS email_count FROM Emails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING email_count > 5;
SELECT call_id, customer_id, duration_minutes * 1.5 AS billable_duration FROM Calls;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers FROM Calls;
SELECT * FROM Calls UNION SELECT * FROM Emails;
SELECT call_id, customer_id, call_date, duration_minutes FROM Calls WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_date, subject FROM Emails WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT call_id, customer_id, call_date, duration_minutes FROM Calls WHERE call_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_date, subject FROM Emails WHERE email_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_duration FROM Calls GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS num_emails FROM Emails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_emails > 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(duration_minutes) AS longest_call_duration FROM Calls GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(duration_minutes) AS shortest_call_duration FROM Calls GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS num_emails FROM Emails GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_emails DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_call_duration FROM Calls GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_call_duration DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_call_duration FROM Calls WHERE call_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_call_duration DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS num_emails FROM Emails WHERE email_date > '2021-12-01' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_emails DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_date, subject FROM Emails WHERE subject LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY email_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(duration_minutes) AS longest_call_duration FROM Calls WHERE duration_minutes > 10 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_call_duration FROM Calls WHERE duration_minutes < 5 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS num_emails FROM Emails WHERE body LIKE '%important%' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, email_date, subject FROM Emails WHERE customer_id = 2 AND email_date > '2022-02-15' ORDER BY email_date;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_call_duration FROM Calls WHERE call_date > '2022-03-01' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_call_duration > 15;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(duration_minutes) AS shortest_call_duration FROM Calls WHERE customer_id = 3 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, email_date, subject FROM Emails WHERE email_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY email_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS num_emails FROM Emails WHERE email_date < '2021-12-01' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_emails < 3;
SELECT * FROM calls;
SELECT customer_id, call_datetime FROM calls;
SELECT call_datetime, call_duration FROM calls;
SELECT * FROM emails;
SELECT customer_id, email_content FROM emails;
SELECT email_datetime, email_subject FROM emails;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT customer_id, meeting_location FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_datetime, meeting_notes FROM meetings;
SELECT call_id, customer_id, call_duration FROM calls WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT email_id, email_datetime FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_location FROM meetings WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM calls WHERE call_datetime BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE email_datetime >= '2023-06-01';
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_datetime <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE LENGTH(email_content) > 100;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(meeting_notes) > 200;
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS average_duration FROM calls;
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM calls;
SELECT * FROM calls WHERE call_duration > 10
SELECT customer_id, call_datetime FROM calls WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT customer_id, call_datetime FROM calls WHERE call_duration > 20
SELECT customer_id, AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration FROM calls GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM calls GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM calls GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, call_datetime FROM calls WHERE call_duration > 30 ORDER BY call_datetime DESC
SELECT customer_id, call_duration, call_datetime FROM calls WHERE call_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_datetime FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 456
SELECT customer_id, email_subject FROM emails WHERE LENGTH(email_content) > 100
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM emails GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, email_datetime, email_subject FROM emails WHERE email_datetime < '2022-03-15'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(LENGTH(email_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM emails GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, MAX(LENGTH(email_content)) AS max_content_length FROM emails GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, email_datetime FROM emails WHERE email_subject LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT meeting_id, customer_id, meeting_datetime FROM meetings WHERE customer_id = 789
SELECT customer_id, meeting_location FROM meetings WHERE meeting_datetime > '2022-02-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM meetings GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, meeting_datetime, meeting_location FROM meetings WHERE meeting_notes IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_id, AVG(LENGTH(meeting_notes)) AS avg_notes_length FROM meetings GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM Calls;
SELECT call_id, customer_id, call_duration FROM Calls;
SELECT call_id, call_date FROM Calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM Emails;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_subject FROM Emails;
SELECT email_id, email_date FROM Emails WHERE LENGTH(email_body) > 100;
SELECT * FROM Meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, customer_id, meeting_duration FROM Meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 10;
SELECT Customers.customer_id, customer_name, email_id, email_subject FROM Customers JOIN Emails ON Customers.customer_id = Emails.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(call_id) AS total_calls FROM Calls GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call FROM Calls GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(meeting_duration) AS avg_meeting_duration FROM Meetings GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, count(email_id) AS total_emails FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Emails ON Customers.customer_id = Emails.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calls, MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM Calls;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails, MIN(email_date) AS oldest_email_date FROM Emails;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(meeting_duration) AS total_meeting_duration FROM Meetings GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT customer_id, call_duration FROM Calls WHERE call_duration > 20;
SELECT customer_id, call_duration FROM Calls WHERE call_duration BETWEEN 10 AND 30;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(call_id) AS total_calls FROM Customers JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(call_duration) AS longest_call_duration FROM Customers JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(call_duration) AS average_call_duration FROM Customers JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, call_date FROM Customers JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id WHERE call_duration > 15;
SELECT customer_name, call_date FROM Customers JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id WHERE call_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM Customers JOIN Emails ON Customers.customer_id = Emails.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, meeting_duration FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(meeting_duration) AS longest_meeting_duration FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(meeting_duration) AS average_meeting_duration FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, meeting_date FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id WHERE meeting_duration > 30;
SELECT customer_name, meeting_date FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Calls.call_duration FROM Customers JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id WHERE Calls.call_duration > 15;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Emails.email_subject FROM Customers JOIN Emails ON Customers.customer_id = Emails.customer_id;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Emails.email_date FROM Customers JOIN Emails ON Customers.customer_id = Emails.customer_id WHERE Emails.email_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Meetings.meeting_duration FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id WHERE Meetings.meeting_duration > 20;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Meetings.meeting_date FROM Customers JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id WHERE Meetings.meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Calls.call_duration, Emails.email_subject, Meetings.meeting_duration FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Calls ON Customers.customer_id = Calls.customer_id LEFT JOIN Emails ON Customers.customer_id = Emails.customer_id LEFT JOIN Meetings ON Customers.customer_id = Meetings.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM calls;
SELECT call_id, customer_id FROM calls;
SELECT call_date, call_duration FROM calls;
SELECT * FROM emails;
SELECT email_id, customer_id FROM emails;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM emails;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, customer_id FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_notes FROM meetings;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions;
SELECT customers.customer_name, calls.call_date FROM customers INNER JOIN calls ON customers.customer_id = calls.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, emails.email_subject FROM customers INNER JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, meetings.meeting_date FROM customers INNER JOIN meetings ON customers.customer_id = meetings.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, interactions.interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT calls.call_date, emails.email_subject FROM calls INNER JOIN emails ON calls.customer_id = emails.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers JOIN calls ON customers.customer_id = calls.customer_id WHERE call_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id WHERE email_subject = 'Request for information';
SELECT customer_name, meeting_date FROM customers JOIN meetings ON customers.customer_id = meetings.customer_id WHERE meeting_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) FROM calls;
SELECT AVG(call_duration) FROM calls WHERE call_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, call_date FROM customers JOIN calls ON customers.customer_id = calls.customer_id WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT customer_name, meeting_date, meeting_notes FROM customers JOIN meetings ON customers.customer_id = meetings.customer_id WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id WHERE email_body LIKE '%important%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(call_id) AS call_count FROM calls GROUP BY customer_id HAVING call_count > 5;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(meeting_date) AS last_meeting_date FROM customers JOIN meetings ON customers.customer_id = meetings.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM calls WHERE call_date >= '2022-03-01');
SELECT customer_name, AVG(call_duration) AS avg_call_duration FROM customers JOIN calls ON customers.customer_id = calls.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING avg_call_duration > 15;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, meeting_date FROM customers JOIN meetings ON customers.customer_id = meetings.customer_id ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_id FROM customers LEFT JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, MIN(interaction_date) AS first_interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY email_subject ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT email_id) AS email_count FROM customers JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING email_count > 2;
